author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) will contest all the seats in Puducherry for the forthcoming election said AAP leader Somnath Bharti here on Saturday.

Talking to reporters here, Mr. Bharti said that the party will contest all the seats and if elected to power will replicate the reforms of the AAP Government in New Delhi.

He said that people in Puducherry had been waiting for a force which can free the Union Territory from all sorts of ills and provide a platform where people can cherish their rights.

The AAP has been approached by people across the country, as it can provide them an opportunity for clean politics, he claimed.

The party will form corruption free govt. says AAP leader Somnath Bharti
title: AAP to contest in all seats in Puducherry
